column5: "Michigan has asked the U. S. Supreme Court to order Chicago- area shipping locks closed to keep carp out, a request supported by Minnesota, Wisconsin, Ohio, Pennsylvania and New York. Uhh...can you guys keep this on issue and not about the leader of another country, please. It has had nothing to do with the the office of the President until this point. Not to belittle the issue, but both Bush and Obama had bigger things to worry about.
So I gather that the plan is to make spot trapping a daily ritual until it is too late?
Ya, spot trapping sounds like something you do just so you can say you're doing something.  Can't imagine it being very effective.
